@graph.name: Park Type Branch
@graph.description: Categorizes amusement parks and entertainment venues by type: Family Entertainment Center, Retail Village, Adventure Park, Ice/Sky/Snow Dome, Entertainment Complex.

hasBranch.name: Family Entertainment Center
hasBranch.description: A venue offering a variety of entertainment options for the whole family, including arcade games, mini-golf, and small rides.

example.name: Fun Galaxy
example.description: A family-friendly venue packed with arcade games, laser tag, and indoor play areas designed to entertain children and adults alike.

hasBranch.name: Retail Village
hasBranch.description: A themed shopping area within a park, offering a range of retail shops, boutiques, and eateries, often reflecting the park's overall theme.

example.name: Marketplace Meadows
example.description: An immersive retail village where visitors can shop for unique gifts, dine in themed restaurants, and enjoy street performances.

hasBranch.name: Adventure Park
hasBranch.description: Outdoor parks focused on adventure sports and activities like zip-lining, rock climbing, and obstacle courses.

example.name: Thrillseeker's Haven
example.description: An outdoor adventure park offering challenging obstacle courses, high-speed zip lines, and rock climbing for thrill-seekers of all ages.

hasBranch.name: Ice & Snow, Sky, Track & Karting
hasBranch.description: Enclosed venues that offer year-round ice skating, skiing, or snowboarding experiences, or indoor skydiving, or roller skating, or karting (indoor or outdoor).

example.name: Winter Wonderland Dome
example.description: A climate-controlled dome offering indoor skiing and snowboarding slopes, ice skating rinks, and snow play areas for family fun.

hasBranch.name: Entertainment Complex
hasBranch.description: Large venues combining various forms of entertainment and attractions, but also retail, cinemas, bowling alleys, concert halls, and dining options.

example.name: Entertainment City
example.description: A sprawling complex featuring the latest in cinema, live music venues, gourmet dining, and boutique bowling, providing entertainment for all interests.
